# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="61ee3-102">Lägga till emojis i e-postmeddelanden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61ee3-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="61ee3-103">Du kan infoga emojis i dina meddelanden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61ee3-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="61ee3-104">Svara på ett befintligt e-postmeddelande eller välj **Nytt meddelande**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61ee3-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="61ee3-105">Klicka på knappen **Infoga emojis**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61ee3-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="61ee3-106">längst ned i meddelandefönstret för att öppna fönstret uttryck.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61ee3-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="61ee3-107">Söka efter och välja emoji eller GIF som du vill infoga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="61ee3-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
